forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. West northwest wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco basks in a lively interplay of sunshine and gentle winds this afternoon. As the sun hangs brightly above, casting warm golden hues over the landscape, temperatures hover around a mild 59 degrees before subtly descending to 57. The breeze from the west-northwest adds a refreshing touch, flirtatiously tousling hair and rustling leaves—an energetic companion that takes charge with gusts reaching up to 24 mph. The horizon rests clear, the expanse unmarred by the usual fog, allowing for crisp views of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge shimmering against the azure backdrop.

As evening approaches, the sky will continue its transformation into a canvas of twilight, settling down to a soft 46 degrees. With the winds calming, tonight offers a coolness best met with light layers; a cozy sweater or a light jacket will serve well in these charming lower temperatures. Given the splendid conditions of the day, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the local cafés, perhaps with a good book in tow, would be a delightful way to embrace the beauty of the city as day turns into night. The evening promises clarity and serenity, perfect for introspection or casual conversation with friends beneath the stars.
